traditional_foods.description_ar: طبق من العدس والأرز مع البصل المقلي
traditional_foods.description_en: A dish of lentils and rice with fried onions
traditional_foods.memory_prompt_ar: هل تتذكر طبق المجدرة؟ هل كانت والدتك تطبخه؟
traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Do you remember Mujadara? Did your mother cook it?

traditional_foods.description_ar: حساء أخضر مصنوع من أوراق الملوخية مع الدجاج أو اللحم
traditional_foods.description_en: Green soup made from jute leaves with chicken or meat

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Did you like Molokhia? How was it cooked in your home?

traditional_foods.description_ar: كرات من البرغل واللحم المفروم محشوة باللحم والبصل والصنوبر
traditional_foods.description_en: Balls of bulgur and minced meat stuffed with meat, onions, and pine nuts

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Do you remember Kibbeh? Did your family make it for special occasions?

traditional_foods.description_ar: طبق من حبوب الكسكس مع الخضروات واللحم أو الدجاج
traditional_foods.description_en: A dish of couscous grains with vegetables and meat or chicken
traditional_foods.memory_prompt_ar: هل أكلت الكسكس في طفولتك؟ كيف كان يُحضر؟
traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Did you eat Couscous in your childhood? How was it prepared?

traditional_foods.description_ar: طبق أردني تقليدي من الأرز واللحم مع اللبن المجفف (جميد)
traditional_foods.description_en: Traditional Jordanian dish of rice and meat with dried yogurt (jameed)

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Do you remember Mansaf? On what occasions did you eat it?

traditional_foods.description_ar: كرات مقلية من الحمص أو الفول المهروس مع البهارات
traditional_foods.description_en: Fried balls of ground chickpeas or fava beans with spices
traditional_foods.memory_prompt_ar: هل كنت تحب الفلافل؟ من أين كنت تشتريها؟
traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Did you like Falafel? Where did you buy it from?

traditional_foods.description_ar: طبق من الأرز والخضروات واللحم يُقلب رأساً على عقب عند التقديم
traditional_foods.description_en: A dish of rice, vegetables, and meat that is flipped upside down when served

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Do you remember Maqluba? Who used to cook it in your family?

traditional_foods.description_ar: سلطة من الباذنجان المشوي مع الطحينة والثوم

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Did you like Baba Ghanoush? Did your mother make it at home?

traditional_foods.description_ar: طبق سعودي تقليدي من الأرز واللحم أو الدجاج مع البهارات
traditional_foods.description_en: Traditional Saudi dish of rice and meat or chicken with spices

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Do you remember Kabsa? How was it cooked in your region?

traditional_foods.description_ar: حلوى مصنوعة من العجين الرقيق والمكسرات والقطر
traditional_foods.description_en: A sweet pastry made of thin dough, nuts, and syrup

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Did you like Baklava? On what occasions did you eat it?

traditional_foods.description_ar: طبق من الحمص المهروس مع الطحينة والليمون والثوم
traditional_foods.description_en: A dish of mashed chickpeas with tahini, lemon, and garlic
traditional_foods.memory_prompt_ar: هل كنت تأكل الحمص في طفولتك؟ كيف كان يُقدم؟
traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Did you eat Hummus in your childhood? How was it served?

traditional_foods.description_ar: سلطة من البقدونس والبرغل والطماطم والبصل والنعناع

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Did you like Tabbouleh? Who used to make it in your family?

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Did you like Shawarma? Where did you buy it from?

traditional_foods.description_ar: حلوى مصنوعة من العجين الرفيع أو السميد مع الجبن والقطر
traditional_foods.description_en: A sweet made of thin noodle-like pastry or semolina with cheese and syrup

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Do you remember Kunafa? On what occasions did you eat it?

traditional_foods.description_ar: طبق من الخبز المحمص واللبن والحمص أو اللحم

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Did you like Fatteh? How was it prepared in your home?

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Do you remember Dolma? Who used to roll it in your family?

traditional_foods.description_en: Various vegetables stuffed with rice and meat like zucchini and eggplant

traditional_foods.memory_prompt_en: Did you eat Fattoush? Did you like sumac on it?
